format: A data frame with 21 observations on the following 6 variables.
description:
Description
A simple data set on Sweden's counties.
title: The Counties of Sweden
reference: This is a simple Wikipedia scrape job from 7 November 2022.

parameters.county: the name of the county, in Swedish
parameters.area: the size of the county in square kilometers
parameters.nuts: the Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics (NUTS) code for the county
parameters.pop2019: the size of the county in 2019
parameters.iso: the ISO 3166-2 code for the county
parameters.centre: the administrative centre, or centres, of the county
